OOC: Sorry I have not been posting much lately.

::Hot Rod::

He looks as the hologram changes.
"Whats this about?"

::Epyon::

He simply stands next to Hot Rod waiting for whatever.

::DrillBit::

He strugles but cannot move do to the field. He gets DarkFate's message
but hopes that he remembers to shut down the field.

::KitKat2::

She continues to sleep in her room. She begins to wounder when DrillBit
will come home.
